message.content: IHE DESIGNATED RECIPIENTS NAMED ABOVE.THIS MESSAGE MAY BE AN ATTORNEY-CLIENT COMMUNICATION,AND AS SUCH IS PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL. IF THE READER OF THIS MESSAGE IS NOT THE INTENDED RECIPIENT OR AN AGENT RESPONSIBLE FOR DELIVERING IT TO THE INTENDED RECIPIENT,YOU ARE HEREBYNOTIFIED THAT YOU HAVE RECSIVED THIS DOCUMENT IN ERROR,AND THAT ANY REVIEW, DISSEMINATION, DISTRISUTION, OR COPYING OF THIS MESSAGE IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. IF YOU HAVE RECEIVED THIS COMMUNICATION IN ERROR,PLEASE NOTIFY US IMMEDIATELY SY TELEPHONE AND RETURN THE ORIGINAL MESSAGE TOUS BY MAIL.THANK YOU.
